response.overview: The Shadow Mountains, 1983. Red and Mandy lead a loving and peaceful existence; but when their pine-scented haven is savagely destroyed, Red is catapulted into a phantasmagoric journey filled with bloody vengeance and laced with fire.
response.tagline: A BRUTAL JOURNEY TOWARDS THE WILDEST REVENGE.
response.title: Mandy

release_dates.note: MOTELX - Lisbon International Horror Film Festival
